subject: Football
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Seahawks’ Richard Sherman, one of the N.F.L.’s best cornerbacks, will not be suspended after arguing successfully that improper handling of his urine sample negated a positive result.
snippet: The Seahawks’ Richard Sherman, one of the N.F.L.’s best cornerbacks, will not be suspended after arguing successfully that improper handling of his urine sample negated a positive result.
